mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) NUM, MESSAGEVIEW.* FROM MESSAGEVIEW) M WHERE M.NUM BETWEEN 1+(${page}-1)*10 AND 10*${page};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGES(Code, Title, Content, Writer, Recipient, RegDate) VALUES(#{code},#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{recipient},#{regDate})
